Package game.actor.enemy.undead

Class PilesOfBones

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.actor.enemy.Enemies
game.actor.enemy.undead.Undead
game.actor.enemy.undead.PilesOfBones
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Breakable, RunesSource, Resettable
public class PilesOfBones extends Undead implements Breakable
A class representing a pile of bones that can be broken by a player to obtain a weapon and spawn an enemy. Extends Undead class and implements Breakable interface.
Author:
Belvinjeet Kaur

  • Constructor Details

    • PilesOfBones

      public PilesOfBones(Actor enemy)
      Constructs a new pile of bones with the specified enemy actor. Creates a new instance of the Piles of Bones class with a name of "PilesofBones", a display character of 'X', hit points value of 9999, retrieves the first weapon item from the enemy's weapon inventory and adds the BREAKABLE capability to the PilesOfBones object that allows it to be broken or destroyed by the player or other actors in the game.
      Parameters:
      enemy - The actor representing the enemies to spawn.

  • Method Details

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      This method represents the turn that the actor takes in the game. If the actor is on the map, its unhitCount will be incremented by one. If the unhitCount reaches 3, the actor will be removed from the map and the enemy will be spawned. If the actor is not on the map, it will not do anything and return a DoNothingAction.
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class Enemies
      Parameters:
      actions - A collection of possible Actions for the actor to take
      lastAction - The Action that was taken last turn, if any
      map - The GameMap containing the actor
      display - The Display where the map is drawn
      Returns:
      a DoNothingAction.

      Parameters:

    • breakItem

      public String breakItem(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Drops the weapon item and removes the breakable object from the game map when it is broken.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • canBreak

      public boolean canBreak(Actor otherActor)
      Determines if an actor is able to break this object based on its capabilities.
      Specified by:
      canBreak in interface Breakable
      Parameters:
      otherActor - The actor attempting to break this object.
      Returns:
      True if the actor is not of type UNDEAD and can break this object, false otherwise.
